title: How to Create Promotional Offers with ChatGPT
description: Generate seasonal promos and special offers that drive bookings during slow periods.
requirements: Knowledge of your typical services and prices
A slow period or season you want to fill

steps.title: Identify when you need promos
substeps: Look at your calendar: When are you least busy?
Typical slow periods vary by trade
January-February (post-holiday slump)
Mid-summer or mid-winter depending on your service
steps.tip: Promos work best when you have capacity. Don't discount when you're already booked.

steps.title: Use ChatGPT to brainstorm offers
substeps: Go to chat.openai.com
Try: 'Give me 5 promotional offer ideas for a [your trade] business in [season/month]. Include a catchy name and what the offer includes.'
Example output: 'Spring Tune-Up Special: 20% off AC maintenance if booked by March 31'

steps.title: Choose the right type of offer
steps.description: Different promos work for different goals.
substeps: Percentage off: '20% off' — easy to understand
Dollar amount off: '$50 off' — feels bigger for expensive services
Bundle: 'Book 2 services, get the third 50% off'
Deadline: 'Book by Friday and get X' — creates urgency
steps.tip: Don't discount so much that you lose money. 10-20% off is usually enough.

steps.title: Create the promo copy
steps.description: Write the text for posts, emails, and texts.
substeps: Ask ChatGPT: 'Write a short social media post announcing [your promo]. Keep it casual and include a call-to-action.'
Get versions for: Facebook post, text message, email
Include: What the offer is, when it expires, how to redeem

steps.title: Promote it everywhere
steps.description: An offer nobody sees is useless.
substeps: Post on Facebook, Instagram, Nextdoor
Text your past customer list
Send an email campaign
Update your Google Business Profile with a post

steps.title: Track results
substeps: Ask 'How did you hear about us?' when people call
Track: Number of bookings that mention the promo
Calculate: Revenue from promo vs revenue lost to discount
Save winning promos to repeat next year

successMessage: You created a promotional offer! Share it everywhere and fill your slow period.
proTips: Limited-time offers work better than ongoing discounts
Early-bird promos (book early for busy season) are great for cash flow
Try a referral promo: 'Refer a friend, you both get $25 off'
